DOC.brief_summary: This 12 month study monthly injection ranibizumab subject polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy diagnose fluoresceins/indocyanine green ( FA/ICG ) angiography .
DOC.detailed_description: Previous treatment subject allow long appropriate washout period elapse . Patients follow 4M ETDRS vision test well schedule OCT , ICG , FA Fundus Photography .
DOC.criteria: Ability provide inform consent comply study assessment duration one year Age > = 25 year Polypoidal Choroidal Vasculopathy note fluorescein ICG angiography : active leakage , active bleeding recent decrease vision BCVA use ETDRS 20/32 20/400 Any history previous vitrectomy Previous cataract ocular surgery within 2 month day 0 Active intraocular inflammation study eye Active infection conjunctivitis , keratitis , scleritis , endophthalmitis either eye Participation another investigational drug within past 30 day Prior sodium pegaptanib , verteporfin photodynamic therapy , intravitreal steroid , bevacizumab within 30 day study entry Blood pressure > 180/110 ( use antihypertensives allow long hypertension control stable ) Pregnancy
